column3: “Completely satisfying combination of mood elevating happiness, with a long lasting body relaxation that I have instantly fallen in complete LOVE with! Oh Canada! Been hanging steady with this strain, a 70/30 Indica dominate that never makes me pass out, awesome! Others may need that sleepy hybrid, but Sky Dog is so fun, it will make you snore with a eventual, can't wait to wake up and do it again" smile on your face...”"
“A truly amazing strain. Some of the smelliest herb I've ever had.  Picked up an 1/8th from JPC in Phoenix and I was blown away.  One of my top 5 for surel”
“This strain is really nice. Dense and drenched in crystals. A very tingly high. I recommend this.”

“Got some and it has lasted me a good while, unlike other strains!
Does give some harsh dry mouth but the high lasts!”
“Smooth, groove high! Smoked this while it was raining and fell in love. Love the crystal dusting as well.”
“very relaxing high.  only smoked half a bowl n was lit for a lil bit.  high didn't last more than a few hours.  definitely help with inflammation n pain.”
“Excellent flavor and head!!!  Tried CO2 shatter and was really surprised.   Excellent pain treatment for my injury.  Would compare the pain treatment as if u took a Vicodin.  Go MMJ!!!!”
“This is definitely my top 3, I got a cut of this stuff from my dealer and it lasted weeks. Very high potency but a little dry, but absolutely worth the buy.”
“This made me feel high as fuck, one of my favs.”
“Heavy Indica stone. The Bud Clustering is very true. Lots of trikes and redish hairs with a gasoline smell. ⛽️”
“This is newly in my top ten strains. It has a great potent flavor to it, really a good anytime weed.”
“Pretty crystals; harsh diesel taste; overall, helped me sink down into the darkness after a stressful day”

“As an avid indica fan this was the right strain for me, very heavy behind the eyes combined with full body relaxation. The smell is quite pungent with a strong emphasis on sweetness combined with skunky notes. As for the taste it was on the stronger side and pungent but a good change.  The high was enjoyable and I somewhat felt more concentrated and focused, a truly enjoyable  sedation.”

“Top 3 of all time. beautiful mellow high that picks you up right off the first few tokes and keeps you in a glowing aura type high that is hard to find. Perfect flowers just oodled with crystals. You just cant go wrong with a cone full of skydog. 👌”

“Skydog provides a very mellow, relaxing high with good pain relief. It's best consumed in the evenings when you plan to stay in. It did make me feel sleepy within about an hour after vaping. Overall a stellar strain for pain relief and to facilitate sleep. Would recommend :o)”
“Excellent strain. Would not put it under my favorites but it went down easily when smoking. Coughed a little too much on a bong as it is a slightly dry strain. Still good, non the less.”
